kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait until page contains element then verify text
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Page should have contained text 'Test Management' but did not.
kw.status: Page should have contained text 'Test Management' but did not.

kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

test.name: Data-Driven Test Case

kw.name: Create Test via automate
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'TC-001: To verify the allocation of Compensatory Leave from OT in the case of the first time in the year(2025).' into text field 'xpath=//input[@type='text' and @placeholder='Test case title']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg:
Typing text 'Pre-condition - Existing OT(Current Period 2025) in Approved status and Request type = Compensatory Leave.
Teststep Description HR 1. Click Time Off menu 2. Click Mass Leaves Allocation 3. Click Allocate Compensatory Leave 4. Click Add a line for select the employee 5. Click Allocate Compensatory Leave
Employee, OT requester 6. Click ESS menu. 7. Click Leave Request. 8. Click New 9. Verify Time Off Type * Compensatory leave
Expected Result HR 4. The system will show the list of employees with OT in Approved status and Request type = Compensatory Leave. 5. The system will create a new Mass Leave Allocation named Compensatory Leave 2025.
Employee, OT requester 9. The total value of Compensatory Leave is updated depending on OT hours.' into text field 'xpath=//p[@class='is-empty is-editor-empty']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait until page contain element tag
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[@class='antiButton primary large jf-center sh-no-shape bs-solid gap-medium']'.

kw.arg: testcase_title=TC-001: To verify the allocation of Compensatory Leave from OT in the case of the first time in the year(2025).

testcase_description=Pre-condition - Existing OT(Current Period 2025) in Approved status and Request type = Compensatory Leave.
Teststep Description HR 1. Click Time Off menu 2. Click Mass Leaves Allocation 3. Click Allocate Compensatory Leave 4. Click Add a line for select the employee 5. Click Allocate Compensatory Leave
Employee, OT requester 6. Click ESS menu. 7. Click Leave Request. 8. Click New 9. Verify Time Off Type * Compensatory leave
Expected Result HR 4. The system will show the list of employees with OT in Approved status and Request type = Compensatory Leave. 5. The system will create a new Mass Leave Allocation named Compensatory Leave 2025.
Employee, OT requester 9. The total value of Compensatory Leave is updated depending on OT hours.

test.doc: สร้าง Test Case จากข้อมูลใน Excel

test.name: Data-Driven Test Case

kw.name: Create Test via automate
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'TC-002: To verify the allocation of Compensatory Leave from OT in the case of the second time onward in the year(2025).' into text field 'xpath=//input[@type='text' and @placeholder='Test case title']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg:
Typing text 'Pre-condition - Existing OT(Current Period 2025) in Approved status and Request type = Compensatory Leave. - Need to continue from TC-001
Teststep Description HR process in secon time continue from TC-001 1. Click Time Off menu 2. Click Mass Leaves Allocation 3. Click Allocate Compensatory Leave 4. Click Add a line for select the employee 5. Click Allocate Compensatory Leave
Employee, OT requester 6. Click ESS menu. 7. Click Leave Request. 8. Click New 9. Verify Time Off Type * Compensatory leave
Expected Result HR 4. The system will show the list of employees with OT in Approved status and Request type = Compensatory Leave. 5. The system will not create a new Mass Leave Allocation. The system will add name into existing Mass Leave Allocation(Compensatory Leave 2025).
Employee, OT requester 9. The total value of Compensatory Leave is updated depending on OT hours.' into text field 'xpath=//p[@class='is-empty is-editor-empty']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait until page contain element tag
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[@class='antiButton primary large jf-center sh-no-shape bs-solid gap-medium']'.

kw.arg: testcase_title=TC-002: To verify the allocation of Compensatory Leave from OT in the case of the second time onward in the year(2025).

testcase_description=Pre-condition - Existing OT(Current Period 2025) in Approved status and Request type = Compensatory Leave. - Need to continue from TC-001
Teststep Description HR process in secon time continue from TC-001 1. Click Time Off menu 2. Click Mass Leaves Allocation 3. Click Allocate Compensatory Leave 4. Click Add a line for select the employee 5. Click Allocate Compensatory Leave
Employee, OT requester 6. Click ESS menu. 7. Click Leave Request. 8. Click New 9. Verify Time Off Type * Compensatory leave
Expected Result HR 4. The system will show the list of employees with OT in Approved status and Request type = Compensatory Leave. 5. The system will not create a new Mass Leave Allocation. The system will add name into existing Mass Leave Allocation(Compensatory Leave 2025).
Employee, OT requester 9. The total value of Compensatory Leave is updated depending on OT hours.

test.doc: สร้าง Test Case จากข้อมูลใน Excel
